about_me.des: Software Engineer with +10 years of industry experience and over 5 years leading tech development teams. I am passionate about coding and also about coaching and mentoring people who are learning to code. Life is a continuous learning process. I can make lots of friends when I coding and travel. Latina based in Canada.
